00038 
00039 Entree& Simpler_Base::readOn(Entree& is )
00040 {
00041   int is_seuil_resol_lu = 0;
00042 
00043   double seuil_convergence_solveur_prov=-1;
00044   is_seuil_convg_variable = 0;
00045   controle_residu_ = 0;
00046   Motcle accferme = "}";
00047   Motcle accouverte = "{";
00048   int le_solveur_est_lu = 0;
00049   Motcle motlu;
00050   is >> motlu;
00051   assert(motlu==accouverte);
00052   no_qdm_ = 0;
00053   is >> motlu;
00054   Nom le_solveur_lu_;
00055   while(motlu!=accferme )
00056     {
00057       if (motlu=="max_iter_implicite")
00058         {
00059           Cerr << motlu << finl;
00060           Cerr << motlu <<" is no more longer understood by Simpler but by the time scheme"<<finl;
00061           exit();
00062         }
00063       else if (motlu=="seuil_convergence_implicite")
00064         {
00065           Cerr << motlu << finl;
00066           is >> param_defaut_.seuil_convergence_implicite();
00067         }
00068       else if (motlu=="seuil_convergence_variable")
00069         {
00070           Cerr << "Option seuil_convergence_variable is not yet understood." << finl;
00071           exit();
00072           Cerr << motlu << finl;
00073           facteur_convg_ = 100;
00074           is_seuil_convg_variable = 1;
00075         }
00076       else if (motlu=="seuil_generation_solveur")
00077         {
00078           Cerr << motlu << finl;
00079           is_seuil_resol_lu = 1;
00080           is >> param_defaut_.seuil_generation_solveur();
00081         }
00082       else if (motlu=="seuil_verification_solveur")
00083         {
00084           Cerr << motlu << finl;
00085           is >> param_defaut_.seuil_verification_solveur();
00086         }
00087       else if (motlu=="seuil_test_preliminaire_solveur")
00088         {
00089           Cerr << motlu << finl;
00090           is >> param_defaut_.seuil_test_preliminaire_solveur();
00091         }
00092       else if (motlu=="seuil_convergence_solveur")
00093         {
00094           Cerr << motlu << finl;
00095           is_seuil_resol_lu = 1;
00096           is >> seuil_convergence_solveur_prov;
00097         }
00098       else if (motlu=="nb_it_max")
00099         {
00100           is >> param_defaut_.nb_it_max();
00101         }
00102       else if (motlu=="controle_residu")
00103         {
00104           controle_residu_ = 1;
00105         }
00106       else if (motlu=="no_qdm")
00107         {
00108           Cerr << motlu << finl;
00109           no_qdm_ = 1;
00110         }
00111       else if (motlu=="solveur")
00112         {
00113           le_solveur_est_lu = 1;
00114           SChaine toto;
00115 // redefinition de motlu pour garder les minuscules/majuscules
00116           Nom motlubis;
00117           int nb_acc=0;
00118           int ok=0;
00119           while (nb_acc!=0 || !ok)
00120             {
00121               is >>motlubis;
00122               toto<<" "<<motlubis;
00123               if (motlubis=="}") nb_acc--;
00124               else if (motlubis=="{")
00125                 {
00126                   ok=1;
00127                   nb_acc++;
00128                 };
00129             }
00130           le_solveur_lu_ = Nom(toto.get_str());
00131         }
00132       else
00133         {
00134           lire(motlu,is);
00135         }
00136       is >> motlu;
00137     }
00138 
00139   if (seuil_convergence_solveur_prov>0)
00140     {
00141       param_defaut_.set_seuil_solveur_avec_seuil_convergence_solveur(seuil_convergence_solveur_prov);
00142     }
00143   if ((is_seuil_resol_lu==0) && (le_solveur_est_lu==0))
00144     {
00145       Cerr<<"Neither the solving object nor the threshold seuil_convergence_solveur has been indicated."<<finl;
00146       Cerr<<"At least one of them (or both) must be specified."<<finl;
00147       exit();
00148     }
00149 
00150   if (param_defaut_.seuil_convergence_implicite()<0)
00151     param_defaut_.seuil_convergence_implicite() = DMAXFLOAT;
00152 
00153   if (param_defaut_.seuil_verification_solveur()<0)
00154     param_defaut_.seuil_verification_solveur() = DMAXFLOAT;
00155 // on laisse seuil_test_preliminaire <0
00156 
00157 
00158   if (le_solveur_est_lu==0)
00159     {
00160       SChaine toto;
00161       toto<<"Gmres { diag seuil "<<param_defaut_.seuil_generation_solveur()<<" nb_it_max "<< param_defaut_.nb_it_max() << " controle_residu " <<controle_residu_<<" } "<<finl;
00162       le_solveur_lu_=Nom(toto.get_str());
00163     }
00164 
00165   {
00166     EChaine titi(le_solveur_lu_);
00167     titi>> param_defaut_.solveur();
00168   }
00169   param_defaut_.solveur().nommer("solveur_implicite");
00170   return is;
00171 }

00173 //
00174 //
00175 //! retourne le parametre_implicte de l'equation si il existe si il n'existe pas le cree...<br>si les params sont vides on copie ceux du simpler
00176 Parametre_implicite& Simpler_Base::get_and_set_parametre_implicite(Equation_base& eqn)
00177 {
00178   Parametre_equation& param = eqn.parametre_equation();
00179   if (!param.non_nul())
00180     {
00181       param.typer("Parametre_implicite");
00182     }
00183   if (!sub_type(Parametre_implicite,param.valeur()))
00184     {
00185       Cerr<<eqn.que_suis_je()<<" has parameters of type "<<param.que_suis_je()<<" not coherent with "<<que_suis_je()<<finl;
00186       exit();
00187     }
00188 
00189   Parametre_implicite& param_impl = ref_cast(Parametre_implicite,param.valeur());
00190 // on regarde si il y a des valeurs par defaut a recopier
00191   if (param_impl.seuil_convergence_implicite()<0)
00192     param_impl.seuil_convergence_implicite() = param_defaut_.seuil_convergence_implicite();
00193   if (param_impl.seuil_verification_solveur()<0)
00194     param_impl.seuil_verification_solveur() = param_defaut_.seuil_verification_solveur();
00195   if (param_impl.seuil_test_preliminaire_lu()==0)
00196     param_impl.seuil_test_preliminaire_solveur() = param_defaut_.seuil_test_preliminaire_solveur();
00197   if (!param_impl.solveur().non_nul())
00198     param_impl.solveur() = param_defaut_.solveur();
00199 
00200 // Some checks:
00201   if (eqn.probleme().get_coupled())
00202     {
00203       if (param_impl.seuil_convergence_implicite()>0.1*DMAXFLOAT)
00204         {
00205           Cerr << finl << "Error!" << finl;
00206           Cerr << "seuil_convergence_implicite option should be defined in your time scheme." << finl;
00207           Cerr << "It is a mandatory option for a calculation with coupled problems." << finl;
00208           exit();
00209         }
00210     }
00211   /*
00212   else if (param_impl.seuil_convergence_implicite()<0.1*DMAXFLOAT)
00213   {
00214         Cerr << finl << "Error!" << finl;
00215   Cerr << "seuil_convergence_implicite option should be NOT be defined in your time scheme" << finl;
00216   Cerr << "during calculation of a single problem." << finl;
00217   Cerr << "Remove the option." << finl;
00218   exit();
00219   } */
00220   return param_impl;
00221 }
00222 
00223 void Simpler_Base::assembler_matrice_pression_implicite(Equation_base& eqn_NS,const Matrice_Morse& matrice,Matrice& matrice_en_pression_2)
00224 {
00225   Navier_Stokes_std& eqnNS = ref_cast(Navier_Stokes_std,eqn_NS);
00226   const IntVect& tab1 = matrice.get_tab1();
00227   const DoubleVect& coeff = matrice.get_coeff();
00228   const DoubleTab& present = eqn_NS.inconnue().valeurs();
00229   int nb_comp = 1;
00230   int deux_entrees = 0;
00231 
00232   if (present.nb_dim()==2)
00233     {
00234       deux_entrees = 1;
00235       nb_comp = present.dimension(1);
00236     }
00237 
00238   const Zone_VF& la_zone = ref_cast(Zone_VF,eqnNS.zone_dis().valeur());
00239   if (deux_entrees==0)
00240     {
00241       DoubleVect vol2 = la_zone.volumes_entrelaces();
00242       int ns = vol2.size();
00243       for (int i=0; i<ns; i++)
00244         {
00245           int idiag = tab1[i*nb_comp]-1;
00246           double ref = coeff[idiag];
00247           for (int c=1; c<nb_comp; c++)
00248             if (!est_egal(ref,coeff[tab1[i*nb_comp+c]-1]))
00249               {
00250                 Cerr<<"Pb dans Piso sur la diagonale case"<<i<<" comp "<< c<<" ref "<<ref<<" valeurs "<<coeff[tab1[i*nb_comp+c]-1]<<finl;
00251                 exit();
00252               }
00253           vol2[i] = coeff[idiag];
00254         }
00255       vol2.echange_espace_virtuel();
00256       eqnNS.assembleur_pression().valeur().assembler_mat(matrice_en_pression_2,vol2,1,1);
00257     }
00258   else
00259     {
00260       DoubleTab vol2(present);
00261       int ns = vol2.dimension(0);
00262       for (int i=0; i<ns; i++)
00263         for (int c=0; c<nb_comp; c++)
00264           vol2(i,c) = matrice(i*nb_comp+c,i*nb_comp+c);
00265 
00266       vol2.echange_espace_virtuel();
00267       eqnNS.assembleur_pression().valeur().assembler_mat(matrice_en_pression_2,vol2,1,1);
00268     }
00269 
00270   SolveurSys& solveur_pression_ = eqnNS.solveur_pression();
00271   solveur_pression_.valeur().reinit();
00272 }
